Rules.InvariantScript:
Table(
    {
        Title: "Text" , 
        ID: 1 , 
        field_1 : "Text" ,
        field_2 : "Text" , 
        field_3 : "Text" ,
        field_4 : "Text" ,
        field_5 : "Text" ,
        field_6 : "Text" ,
        field_7 : "Text" ,
        field_8 : "Text" ,
        field_9 : "2025-12-25" ,
        field_10 : "2025-12-25" , 
        field_11 : "#f65810"   
    }
)

If( Or( IsBlank(_comp_selected_year) , IsBlank(_comp_selected_month)), 
Parent.Height - Self.Y*2 ,
Parent.Height/10*1 )

If( IsBlank(_comp_selected_month) , 0 ,
If( IsBlank(_comp_selected_year) , 
Parent.Width , 
Parent.Width/4
))

If( Month(ThisItem.Value) <> Month(comp_popup_right.Date_Selected_Input) , ColorValue("#ffffff") , 
If( 
    comp_popup_right.Date_Selected_Input = ThisItem.Value ,  
    ColorValue("#f0f0f0") , 
    Color.White
))

If( Month(ThisItem.Value) <> _comp_selected_month , ColorValue("#959595") , 
If( comp_popup_right.Date_Selected_Input = ThisItem.Value , ColorValue("#222222") , 
If( ThisItem.Value  = Today(),  ColorValue("#ffffff"),
If( Weekday(ThisItem.Value) = 1  , ColorValue("#ef497f") , 
If( Weekday(ThisItem.Value) = 7  , ColorValue("#3a86ff") , 
Color.Black 
)))))

If( Month(ThisItem.Value) <> _comp_selected_month , Color.Transparent , 
If( _comp_selected_month = ThisItem.Value , ColorValue("#f65810") , 
If( ThisItem.Value  = Today(), ColorValue("#00514a") , 
Color.Transparent)))

If( IsBlank( _comp_selected_item_gallery1_40 ) , ColorValue("#222222") , 
If( _comp_selected_item_gallery1_40.ID = ThisItem.ID , 
ColorValue("#000000") , 
ColorValue("#959595") 
))

If( IsBlank( _comp_selected_item_gallery1_40 ) , ColorValue("#222222") , 
If( _comp_selected_item_gallery1_40.ID = ThisItem.ID , 
ColorValue("#000000") , 
ColorValue("#959595") 
))

If( IsBlank( _comp_selected_item_gallery1_40 ) , ColorValue("#222222") , 
If( _comp_selected_item_gallery1_40.ID = ThisItem.ID , 
ColorValue("#000000") , 
ColorValue("#959595") 
))

If( IsBlank(_comp_selected_item_gallery1_40) , 
    ColorFade(ColorValue(ThisItem.field_11), 50%) ,
    If( 
        _comp_selected_item_gallery1_40.ID = ThisItem.ID ,  
        ColorFade(ColorValue(ThisItem.field_11), 50%) , 
        ColorFade(ColorValue("#959595") , 50%)
))
